room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The One 2 Escape Room in Miami
room_description: You are a member of the Dalton Gang - a notorious crime organization in the 1800â€™s. You are out of cash, but luckily you have the help of the local bartender. Your mission: break into the bank through the saloon wall and get all the money from the vault. You only have 60 minutes to get into the bank and get as much money as you can before the sheriff arrives! Can you use your wits to find the hidden clues and steal the money?
